description: MTND Exercício 4b: L = {a^n b^n c^n | n >= 1} - (não-det: adivinha quantos símbolos marcar)
definition:
Estados: q0, q_mark, q_find_b, q_find_c, q_back, q_verify, qf, qr
Alfabeto_Entrada: a, b, c
Alfabeto_Fita: a, b, c, X, Y, Z, _
Simbolo_Branco: _
Estado_Inicial: q0
Estado_Aceitacao: qf
Estado_Rejeicao: qr
Transicoes:
q0, a, q_mark, X, R
q0, X, q_verify, X, R
q_mark, a, q_mark, a, R
q_mark, X, q_mark, X, R
q_mark, b, q_find_b, Y, R
q_mark, b, q_mark, b, R
q_find_b, b, q_find_b, b, R
q_find_b, Y, q_find_b, Y, R
q_find_b, c, q_find_c, Z, L
q_find_c, b, q_back, b, L
q_find_c, Y, q_back, Y, L
q_back, b, q_back, b, L
q_back, Y, q_back, Y, L
q_back, a, q_back, a, L
q_back, X, q_back, X, L
q_back, _, q0, _, R
q_verify, X, q_verify, X, R
q_verify, Y, q_verify, Y, R
q_verify, Z, q_verify, Z, R
q_verify, _, qf, _, N
q_verify, a, qr, a, N
q_verify, b, qr, b, N
q_verify, c, qr, c, N
